custom_nodes.author: gilons
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI File System Manager
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive file system manager for ComfyUI. Browse, create, delete, download files and folders. Includes upload capabilities from various sources like Google Drive, Hugging Face, Civitai, and direct links.

web_extensions.author: gilons
web_extensions.title: ComfyUI File System Manager UI
web_extensions.description: Adds a File System Manager icon and modal interface to ComfyUI for managing files and uploads.
